metadata.title: CVE-2020-6061 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
An exploitable heap out-of-bounds read vulnerability exists in the wayCoTURN 4.5.1.1 web server parses POST requests. A specially crafted HTTPPOST request can lead to information leaks and other misbehavior. Anattacker needs to send an HTTPS request to trigger this vulnerability.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-6061` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

coturn - 4.5.0.3-1ubuntu0.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: coturn package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.5.0.3-1ubuntu0.3').
